list_definition.definition: to see or know the meaning of (something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Speak slowly to foreigners so that they’ll understand you.

list_definition.definition: to learn or realize (something), eg from information received

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: At first I didn’t understand how ill she was
I understood that you were planning to leave today.
